page.title: 10EMPLOYMENT CLAXBY/USSELBY
page.content: There are two distinct area of employment, these being on the farms and in the nearby towns and cities. Those persons employed in agriculture work either for local farmers or for animal rearing establishments such as Cotswold Pigs and Cherry Valley Duckling Farms. At least one farmer provides contract services such as rape seed harvesting over a wide area from his base in Claxby. Non agricultural employment within the area is minimal. Most other people in employment travel to the nearby towns of Market Rasen and Caisor, where there are a number of employers, principally in agriculturally related industries as well as the usual services. A number of residents also travel to Lincoln and Grimsby.
